titleStmt.title: A catalogue of all the cheifest rarities in the publick theater and Anatomie-Hall of the University of Leyden which are so set in order that all may easily bee found in their places. Sic erimus cunĉti postquam nos auferet oreus.

A catalogue of all the cheifest rarities in the publick theater and Anatomie-Hall of the University of Leyden which are so set in order that all may easily bee found in their places. Sic erimus cunĉti postquam nos auferet oreus.
titleStmt.author: Schuyl, Frans. aut
Maersche, Corn. à. aut
Rijksuniversiteit te Leiden. Anatomisch Kabinet.

publicationStmt.publisher: A. MDC LXXXVII. Printed by Jacobus Voorn,

notesStmt.note: Blancken's revision of the Leiden catalogue ran into at least three editions before Francis Schuyl took over the revision.
The date is composed of turned C's.
Includes a poem in Latin on the exhibits, signed: Corn. à Maersche.
Reproduction of original in the John Rylands University Library.
